text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sunrise
Birds singing real high
Feel the breeze on my face
Ready to embrace the day

[Verse 2]
Stars fade into the light
Dreams kept me up all night
World's spinning just right
Life shining
So bright

[Chorus]
Under the open sky
We feel alive
Dancing in the daylight
Together we fly

[Verse 3]
Grass between our toes
Where the river flows
Lay down and just unwind
Leave all worries behind

[Bridge]
Endless days shining on
With you
We'll stay strong
Laughter echoes
Pure delight
Stars will guide us tonight

[Chorus]
Under the open sky
We feel alive
Dancing in the daylight
Together we fly
title: Under the Open Sky
